summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.3°C) and outside temperature (down 3.3°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm) and cloud levels (up 626 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1577 m), and light levels (up 3741 lux) when compared to today.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 1059m and a peak of 3380m, averaging 1097.9m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and very little to no wind will be present. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
